Name: Collisus
About the game: Collisus will be the Ultimate Gun-Fu Simulator. Shoot, Grab, Execute your way through hundreds of enemies with an (upcoming) wide range of martial arts moves and an arsenal of modifiable guns. The 360 Aim & Gun-Fu system has GameDevDave's total devotion to perfect it to a standard never seen before in shooters. Features: Gun-Fu Action Gritty Atmosphere & Gore Incredibly Smooth Controls Shop & Verdict Score Systems Upgrades, Unlockables & Items Custom Game Music System Ultra Graphics Quality Setting 4K Resolution and Shadows Dialogue, Lore & References Upcoming: Background Aim Over-The-Shoulder Aim Quick Angle Switch More Gun-Fu moves Cover System Quick Kills Parkour Smarter Enemies Hostage System Secondary + Rifle Sling More Weapons & Weapon Mods Character Customization Campaign Mode Director System Music System See the full roadmap here: / Social: Active Community, Support & Feedback Access to Discord Channel Full Communication with Developer
